data.title: B Back To Front Left B Site Paintshells
data.description: This is useful for both stopping players from planting the spike on the front left side of B Site, and stopping players from planting the spike if you are in a 1v1 situation on B Site and the enemy player is pressed for time and has to plant, with low risk to you.

data.title: B Back To Front Right B Site Paintshells
data.description: This is useful for both stopping players from planting the spike on the front right side of B Site, and stopping players from planting the spike if you are in a 1v1 situation on B Site and the enemy player is pressed for time and has to plant, with low risk to you.

data.title: A Link To Front A Site Default Paintshells
data.description: This is useful for doing pick damage to players as they push into A Site, as well as delaying the spike plant on A Site, if any enemies on site are low HP, you may even pick up picks on players who get hit by the paintshells on site.
